sentence.Network_en: " They're getting slack , I'm afraid,'said the deep - eyed man, " Our principle is to amuse everyone. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我怕他们都有点不上劲了, ” 凹眼睛的矮个子说, “ 我们的原则是要使得人人都有兴趣. ”

sentence.Network_en: The economy remains deep in recession with few signs of a pick-up.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济仍深陷衰退之中，几乎没有好转的迹象。

sentence.Network_en: Solid low-level waste will be disposed of deep underground.
sentence.Network_cn: 放射性水平低的固体废料将做地下深埋处理。
